title: Strengthening Mathematics Problem-Solving Competencies through Personal Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary-level mathematical concepts and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Learners design personalized mathematics problem-solving strategies using their own devices (BYOD), measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessment; real-time feedback and application store-based resource utilization are available

learning_goals: Learners can independently design diverse mathematical problem-solving strategies in their personal learning environments.
Learners perform self-directed microlearning activities at least three times per week using mobile devices.
Learners demonstrate the ability to apply mathematical modeling to real-world contexts through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
